name: Color Book: Cute Pixel Art App
name_original: Color Book: Cute Pixel Art App
description:
Do you love color games? Color cute pixel art puzzles by number! Everything is free, and new art is added daily.

Game Highlights:
- Color pixel puzzles by number;
- New art added daily;
- Import photos from your device;
- Share time-lapse video;
- Customize coloring settings;
- Have fun!

Cute Color Book is one of the best anti-stress games on the market. We have huge collections of images for both kids and adults. This is a great way to spend some time. Invite your friends and have fun coloring. 2d coloring books is a trend now, so why not to be a part of it? Join now and relax a bit.

Have any questions? Feel free to ask us and we will be there to help you or to listen to your suggestions.
